snippet.title: Pinto Island Demo Trailer | Battle Gem Ponies
snippet.description:
Get Access to this Demo & More: https://www.patreon.com/YotesMark
And subscribe to keep up with the game's development!

Feels good to finally get this overworld overhaul out and into the hands of our supporters! Full game on its way by the end of 2022!

Keep up with all things BGP: https://linktr.ee/YotesMark
